author: domenico
post: William, reading this blog you could find information about Emmanuel Poulle’s articles: https://shroudofturin.wordpress.com/2011/01/01/historian emmanuel poulle and the shroud of turin/ About Chevalier you can read: “Le Linceul de Turin victime d’Ulysse Chevalier”. If you don’t know Emmanuel Poulle you can read: http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emmanuel Poulle http://www.aibl.fr/fr/membres/academ/poulle.html.
title: Let the Debates Begin
